answers.answer: They say you can but last time I did I failed I had to go back to take the longer test but this time I did not eat anything and I passed. Go figure.
My ob told me not to eat after 12am. So the test can come out accurate.

I have always been told to fast for a certain period of time before testing. I always make my appointments in the am so I don't have to go all day without eating. Try fasting longer than 2 hours for the next test and see if that helps with results.

I wasnt told to fast. I failed, but I also had signs of the diabetes before I tested so I already knew I was gonna fail the test. Don't worry, its not that bad and it has nothing to do with u, its just that the placenta isn't breaking down the sugars properly. I thought it was my fault till my diabetes counselor toldme that.

I ate a peanut butter sandwich before my test, like 3 hours before and I failed.  Fasting is best.  So, take the longer, bigger test and fast ahead of time (try to schedule in the am and don't eat when you get up from bed).   I passed on the longer test.  good luck
I wasnt allowed to eat after midnight
Was it the first test?  Don't stress if so.  I failed mine then did the 3 hour and passed:)

M doctor told me to eat before my 1 hr test also and I failed but I did the 3 hr and fasted and I passed with flying colors don't worry jus try and eat healthy night before it and don't eat after 11 pm good luck

I passed my first time because I couldn't eat or drink anything after midnight the day before and when I went to go do the test in the morning it was an hour and I passed. They say it's best not to est or drink anything because if you eat or drink something it'll go up so when you don't eat it's your normal level

Being upset and crying can affect your sugar levels making them higher so if you failed it you should try to relax because there is nothing you can really do except diet exercise and stay relaxed i also failed my fasting test but passed the 2 hour and 3 hour but i decided to go on the diet and watch my sugar intake just to be on the safe side its only during pregnancy so its not a big deal plus the good news is that you will not be super fat after you have your baby...
With the diet that the doctors give you.. You are eating everything your baby needs and not starving is just that you dont eat sugar is not that bad
When you take the glucose test your not supposed to eat anything with sugar or natural sugar.
I couldnt eat or drink anything after 10pm the night before.
I couldnt eat or drink anything after 10pm the night before.

Thank you all so much this made me feel so much better :) I go for my three hour test on Friday.  I'm not gonna eat after midnight Thursday. Again they didn't say to fast but I'm going to.  :)) will update you all...

question: I did my glocuse test yesterday..  I failed..  What were your instructions?  To fast?theu could eat before?  They told me i could eat two hours before.
title: super upset been crying.
